[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Ruslan+Display');
@import url('https://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/korean-font/SoulTitle.css');
.shadow {
    font-family: 'Ruslan Display', 'SoulTitle', cursive;
    font-size: 110%;
}

 .lie{
     margin: 1px;

     background-color: hsla(207, 75%, 50%, .3);

     word-break: unset;
     font-family: var(--mono-font);
}


.taboo a{
    color: green;
    font-style: bold;
    font-weight: 800;
}
[[/module]]
